relation: Senior Vice President of Global Supply Chain Management
pageTitle: Partners | Center for Global Supply Chain Management | USC Marshall School of Business
textBeforeTable: Center Members have the greatest impact on the Center’s mission of NEAR (Network, Education, and Advanced Research). Your annual contribution provides the resources to host leading events, such as the Annual Global Supply Chain Excellence Summit, and conduct thought leadership in cutting-edge supply chain practices. From Patron to Partner, your support allows the Center to be on the forefront of the industry. textAfterTable: Performance Team     Craig Smith Executive Chairman Owens & Minor     Gene Seroka Executive Director Port of Los Angeles     John Kim   3 Plus Logistics     Jonathan Rosenthal CEO Saybrook Port Solutions     Larry Malanga President Mexflex Logistics     Peter YS Kim President and CEO 3 Plus Logistics     Phillipe Lambotte Senior Vice President of Global Supply Chain Management Mattel     Ravi S Kumar Chief Delivery Officer, Executive VP Infosys     Terry Dedeaux CEO DART   I Back to Top I Industry Advisory Board The Industry Advisory Board is established to help the Center fulfill its mission of educating future leaders, building networks, and collaborating with companies. We offer our industry advisory board members two tracks: the Jobs Track and the Networking Track. Our members make an annual commitment to one track with the expectation that they will support our Center in four key areas. Jobs Track Networking Track 1. Internships Provide our students with critical hands-on experiences through internships and training programs. 1. Speaking Speak at student events and program courses regarding your experience in the industry. 2. Job Shadowing Help students explore career paths by hosting job shadowing
